Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
This session will cover the latest positioning of Microsoft AI Dynamics 365 Sales products and provide details about the sales and implementation resources available to partners for enabling AI-driven transformation in the sales function for customers. Key partners HSO, EY and HCL will be sharing their best practices for activating on the Solution Play, innovating with Agentic AI, and displacing competing solutions.
